anomalies.message: [ESCALATE] Amount‐written field is missing, preventing numeric vs. written amount cross‐check and raising a red flag; moderate Random Forest (69.7%) and XGBoost (72.9%) scores warrant manual review.
Numeric vs. written amount mismatch risk

ai_analysis.summary: Amount‐written field is missing, preventing numeric vs. written amount cross‐check and raising a red flag; moderate Random Forest (69.7%) and XGBoost (72.9%) scores warrant manual review.
reasoning: Signature field is present, satisfying mandatory signature requirement.
Amount (written) not extracted—45% of fraud cases in training data involve amount mismatches.
Random Forest and XGBoost individually signal elevated risk (~70%), though ensemble output appears anomalous (0.0%).
No past customer data or similar cases to guide automated decision; manual validation needed.
key_indicators: Numeric vs. written amount mismatch risk
actionable_recommendations: Obtain and inspect the original money order to read the written amount
Contact Western Union to verify the serial number and issuance details
Ask purchaser for government‐issued ID and compare signature samples
